body.name: KIFACI 12 Inch Rechargeable Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Strip Lights Indoor (2-Pack), Battery Powered Under Cabinet Lighting Lights for Kitchen, 54 LED Stair Wall Closet Light Wireless Indoor - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 25 mins
features: Soft and Bright Light: With 54 LED lamp beads and a diffuse light design, our 12 inch Cabinet Strip Lights produce softer, brighter, and more uniform light. Choose from three optional lighting modes: white light, natural light, and warm light.

Wide Sensing Range: Our Cabinet Strip Lights feature a high-sensitivity motion sensor that can detect all objects within 10 feet and 120° from the center of the sensor. Any minor movement will immediately turn on the lights, making them convenient and energy-efficient.

Multiple Sensing Modes: To suit different scenarios, we offer three sensing modes: constant mode, night mode, and day mode. Please read the instructions carefully before use to ensure optimal performance.At the same time, we equipped the cabinet lights with the latest TYP-C charging interface.

Long-Lasting Battery: Our Cabinet Lights have a large battery capacity that can continuously light up for up to 6 hours on the highest brightness settings. They can also be used for over two months in induction mode, making them ideal for long-term use.

Non-Destructive Installation: Our Cabinet Lights can be easily attached to any steel surface without causing damage. Use the included metal sheet to install them anywhere you like without harming your cabinets or walls.

2-Year Warranty: We offer a 2-year manufacturer warranty on our Cabinet Strip Lights. If you experience any issues, contact us and we'll solve your problem within 24 hours. Take advantage of this worry-free guarantee and enjoy the convenience and brightness of our Closet Lights!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights Looking for a convenient and energy-efficient way to light up your kitchen, closet, or stairs? Look no further than the KIFACI 12 Inch Rechargeable Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Strip Lights! This 2-pack of battery-powered lights makes it easy to add bright, reliable illumination to any indoor space without the hassle of wiring or installation.

KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights! Featuring a sleek and stylish silver finish, these lights are sure to complement any decor. Each strip boasts 54 high-quality LED bulbs that provide intense and uniform light, making it easy to see and find everything you need.And thanks to the convenient motion sensor, they turn on automatically when you enter the room and turn off when you leave, helping to save energy and extend battery life.
KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights! under cabinet lights wireless! cabinet lighting! under counter lights for kitchen! battery operated wall lights! motion sensor light! under-counter light fixtures!
KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights! led under cabinet strip lighting! under cabinet lighting! kitchen lights under cabinet!

KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights! Multiple mode trial! Thanks to the convenient motion sensor, they turn on automatically when you enter the room and turn off when you leave, helping to save energy and extend battery life.Of course, sometimes you need a little extra light outside the range of the motion sensor. That's why these lights also come with a manual switch, allowing you to turn them on and off at will. Plus, with a built-in rechargeable battery, you can easily power up your lights using the included USB cable, So whether you need them for your kitchen, closet, stairs, or anywhere else.

KIFACI Under Cabinet Strip Lights! Multiple colors are suitable for different indoor styles! KIFACI 12 Inch Rechargeable Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Strip Lights are the perfect solution for your indoor lighting needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent walking into a dark room
reviews.reviewText: These are so simple and awesome. There sleek, thin, made of steel and led.They come with 2 self stick magnets which you stick on anthying. The fixture sticks th the magnets and comes on with motion in the dark, shuts off automatically, 3 different level of light.Stuck one to my bed frame so when I get up in the dark the floor is lighted. USB charger, one dies out I just stick the other one that is charged to the magnets. Amazon sells the round self stick magnets separately if you want to add the fixture in a different location

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO HANDY!! Love these lights!
reviews.reviewText: We have a MCM credenza that we use as a bar. It's dark inside and these motion activated lights work GREAT! Stuck one on the "ceiling" of each section of the bar. As soon as we slide the door open, the light turns on and we can see exactly what's inside. The light is bright (but adjustable). The fact that they are cordless and rechargeable is great! And the slim design is nice, too. I would definitely recommend these lights, in fact I already have to my neighbor :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lights work great, but have to recharge every 3 days even using the motion sensor, which means they only come on when they detect you in the area. Lights up the counter space very well. Better to get hard wire lights for under counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice lights
reviews.reviewText: I have these in an unlit closet. Simple to mount and the adhesive and magnets seem like they should hold well.The motion detector is outstanding and being able to adjust the color and brightness of the light are nice features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Want to love it…
reviews.reviewText: This would get 5 stars but, like other reviewers warned, after a week the battery life depletes rapidly and one light is mysteriously dimmer. At first these held their charge for a week and now it’s down to a day. I’m waiting for a replacement to see if this is just a fluke but I have a feeling this is just how it is quality-wise. It is convenient when it works so I may just keep them turned off and only use as needed. If you need the automatic on feature you may want to skip this unless you’re ok charging them every 24 hours or less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good product at amazing price
reviews.reviewText: Initially the intent was to use this product in my garage. i needed light out there for my quick trips to the freezer so I wasn't constantly turning the overhead lights on and off. Works fantastic and stays on just long enough for me to get what I need and go back inside the house. I used the remainder of my two sets under the kitchen cabinets. It's so nice to have some soft light in the mornings and not use the harsh light of the overhead fixtures. There are different light brightness options and you can set them to steady on or motions detection. This was a really fine product at a very, very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lights are fantastic!! They stick well and are super bright. I bought a couple packs and used them as undercabinet lighting in my kitchen and as a light in a closet. I LOVE the motion activated aspect and that they come 2 to a pack. Super inexpensive for such a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made & works great. Needs better adhesion
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 2 pack, easily installed but very obvious that the weakest link is the poor adhesive that attaches the magnetic strip to the light. Luckily, some 3M mounting adhesive squares did the trick and we were good to go after charging the lights.This is a handy item and I heartily recommend. Overall, a very high quality product with several brightness and time settings. The charging cable could be longer but that was not a deal-breaker. 4 star rating due to mounting trouble and cord length, but lighting performance is top notch.My best advice is to have some 3M mounting squares at the ready to ensure adhesion or gravity will win.
